question: What is the purpose of HTML?
options: To create the structure and content of web pages;
To add interactivity to web pages;

question: Which language is primarily used for styling web pages?
Explain the concept of SEO (Search Engine Optimization)?
options: The practice of optimizing websites to rank higher in search engine results
The process of adding interactive features to a website
The method of securing a website from cyber attacks
The technique of compressing website files for faster loading
answer: The practice of optimizing websites to rank higher in search engine results

question: What is the purpose of the `React Router` library?
options: To handle client-side routing in a React application
answer: To handle client-side routing in a React application

question: Which tag is used to define the title of a web page?
What is the purpose of the <meta> tag?
options: To define styles for the web page
To provide metadata about the web page
answer: To provide metadata about the web page

question: Which tag is used to create an unordered list?
What is the purpose of the <div> tag?
options: To create a division or section on a web page
answer: To create a division or section on a web page

question: Which attribute is used to specify a unique identifier for an HTML element?
What is the purpose of the <form> tag?
options: To add a video to the web page
To create a form for user input
answer: To create a form for user input

question: Which input type is used for creating a checkbox?
What is the purpose of the <label> tag within a form?
options: To define a text input field
To provide a label for an input field
answer: To provide a label for an input field

question: Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
What is the purpose of the <span> tag?
options: To create a division or section on a web page
To create an inline container for text
answer: To create an inline container for text

question: Which tag is used to add an image to a web page?
What is the purpose of the alt attribute for images?
options: To link the image to another web page
To apply a filter to the image
To define the size of the image
To specify the alternative text for an image
answer: To specify the alternative text for an image

question: Which HTML tag is used to create a semantic header section?
What is the purpose of the <meta name=(viewport)> tag ?
options: To control the viewport on mobile devices for responsive design
To define the character encoding of the document
answer: To control the viewport on mobile devices for responsive design

question: Which tag is used to create a semantic main content section?
What does the required attribute do in an input field?
options: It adds a tooltip to the input field
It sets a default value for the input field
It makes the input field mandatory to fill
answer: It makes the input field mandatory to fill
